title: WeDo Report: Heartwood Evolution Synthesis
description: Forensic analysis of the transition from the Entangled Monolith to the Hardened Trunk.

values.name: The Pre-Kore Mess

values.name: The Bloom Velocity

values.rationale: High-resolution detail was necessary to capture the firm's full operational spectrum.

values.name: The Thrasymachus Standard

values.name: Final Verdict
values.rationale: The trunk is 90% smaller than the peak bloom but 100% more cognitively dense.
